description.value: Your familiar can draw upon the power of your deity to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Cast a Spell] once per day. The familiar can cast the 1-action version of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal] at a level 2 levels lower than your highest-level spell slot, which it can cast only on you. You must be able to cast 3rd-level spells from spell slots to select this ability.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall
